eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 10:40 AM ON DEC 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:40 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police is looking for Melvin Lee Jackson, 73-year-old male, 5 feet 11 inches tall, 200 pounds, with black hair and brown eyes. Melvin was last seen on Sunday, 11/16/2025 near South 16th Street & East Roeser Road. Melvin has a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
